mapper.select:
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${schema}.story ss INNER JOIN ${schema}.product_story ps ON ps.story_id=ss.id WHERE ps.product_id = #{pid} AND ss.del=false AND to_char(ss.added , 'YYYY-MM-DD') like to_char(s.modified , 'YYYY-MM-DD')) as hours,
to_char(s.modified , 'YYYY-MM-DD') as date,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${schema}.story ss INNER JOIN ${schema}.product_story ps ON ps.story_id=ss.id WHERE ps.product_id = #{pid} AND ss.del=true AND to_char(ss.modified , 'YYYY-MM-DD') like to_char(s.modified , 'YYYY-MM-DD')) as delHours
FROM ${schema}.story s INNER JOIN ${schema}.product_story ps ON ps.story_id=s.id WHERE ps.product_id = #{pid}
GROUP BY s.modified ORDER BY s.modified

SELECT COUNT(*) as hours, pi.added as date FROM ${schema}.story s INNER JOIN ${schema}.plot_iteration pi ON pi.story_id = s.id INNER JOIN ${schema}.iteration it ON it.id = pi.iteration_id WHERE it.product_id = #{pid} AND s.del = false AND pi.del = false GROUP BY pi.added ORDER BY pi.added

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${schema}.plot_iteration pi INNER JOIN ${schema}.story s ON s.id = pi.story_id INNER JOIN ${schema}.iteration it ON it.id = pi.iteration_id WHERE it.product_id = #{pid} AND to_char(pi.added,'YYYY-MM-DD') LIKE to_char(now(),'YYYY-MM-DD') AND pi.del = true

SELECT COUNT(*) as hours, pi.added as date FROM ${schema}.story s INNER JOIN ${schema}.plot_iteration pi ON pi.story_id = s.id INNER JOIN ${schema}.iteration it ON it.id = pi.iteration_id WHERE it.product_id = #{pid} AND s.del = false AND pi.del = false GROUP BY pi.added ORDER BY pi.added
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${schema}.product (id, name, descr, owner, user_id, added) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{descr}, #{owner}, #{idCreator}, now());
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.descr, p.owner, p.user_id, p.added, p.modified, p.del, p.done FROM ${schema}.product p INNER JOIN ${schema}.users u ON u.id = p.owner WHERE p.id = #{id} AND p.del = false

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.descr, p.owner, u.fname || ' ' || u.sname AS ownerName, p.user_id, p.added, p.modified, p.del, p.done FROM ${schema}.product p INNER JOIN ${schema}.users u ON u.id = p.owner WHERE p.id = #{id} AND p.del = false
SELECT id, name, descr, owner, user_id, added, modified, del, done FROM ${schema}.product WHERE del = false

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.descr, p.owner, u.fname || ' ' || u.sname AS ownerName, p.user_id, p.added, p.modified, p.del, p.done FROM p${schema}.roduct p INNER JOIN ${schema}.users u ON u.id = p.owner ORDER BY p.id

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.descr, p.owner, p.user_id, p.added, p.modified, p.del, p.done FROM ${schema}.product p INNER JOIN ${schema}.iteration it ON p.id = it.product_id WHERE it.id = #{iid} AND p.del = false ORDER BY p.id

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.descr, p.owner, u.fname || ' ' || u.sname AS ownerName, p.user_id, p.added, p.modified, p.del, p.done FROM ${schema}.product p INNER JOIN ${schema}.iteration it ON p.id = it.product_id INNER JOIN ${schema}.users u ON u.id = p.owner WHERE it.id = #{iid} AND p.del = false ORDER BY p.id

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.descr, p.owner, p.user_id, p.added, p.modified, p.del, p.done FROM ${schema}.product p INNER JOIN ${schema}.product_story ps ON p.id = ps.product_id WHERE ps.story_id = #{sid} AND p.del = false ORDER BY p.id

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.descr, p.owner, u.fname || ' ' || u.sname AS ownerName, p.user_id, p.added, p.modified, p.del, p.done FROM ${schema}.product p INNER JOIN ${schema}.product_story ps ON p.id = ps.product_id INNER JOIN ${schema}.users u ON u.id = p.owner WHERE ps.story_id = #{sid} AND p.del = false ORDER BY p.id

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.descr, p.owner, p.user_id, p.added, p.modified, p.del, p.done FROM ${schema}.product p INNER JOIN ${schema}.team_product tp ON p.id = tp.product_id INNER JOIN ${schema}.users_team ut ON ut.team_id = tp.team_id WHERE ut.user_id = #{uid} AND p.del = false ORDER BY p.id

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.descr, p.owner, u.fname || ' ' || u.sname AS ownerName, p.user_id, p.added, p.modified, p.del, p.done FROM ${schema}.product p INNER JOIN ${schema}.team_product tp ON p.id = tp.product_id INNER JOIN ${schema}.users_team ut ON ut.team_id = tp.team_id INNER JOIN ${schema}.users u ON u.id = ut.user_id WHERE ut.user_id = #{uid} AND p.del = false ORDER BY p.id

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.descr, p.owner, p.user_id, p.added, p.modified, p.del, p.done FROM ${schema}.product p INNER JOIN ${schema}.team_product tp ON p.id = tp.product_id INNER JOIN ${schema}.users_team ut ON ut.team_id = tp.team_id INNER JOIN ${schema}.organization_product op ON op.product_id = tp.product_id INNER JOIN ${schema}.team t ON t.id = tp.team_id
UNION
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.descr, p.owner, p.user_id, p.added, p.modified, p.del, p.done FROM ${schema}.product p INNER JOIN ${schema}.organization_product op ON op.product_id = p.id INNER JOIN ${schema}.users u ON u.id = p.user_id WHERE u.id = #{uid} AND op.organization_id = #{oid} AND p.del = false

(SELECT p.id, p.name, p.descr, p.owner, uo.login AS ownerName, p.user_id, p.added, p.modified, p.del, p.done FROM ${schema}.product p INNER JOIN ${schema}.team_product tp ON p.id = tp.product_id INNER JOIN ${schema}.users_team ut ON ut.team_id = tp.team_id INNER JOIN ${schema}.users u ON u.id = ut.user_id INNER JOIN ${schema}.users uo ON uo.id = p.owner INNER JOIN ${schema}.organization_product op ON op.product_id = tp.product_id INNER JOIN ${schema}.team t ON t.id = tp.team_id WHERE ut.user_id = #{uid} AND op.organization_id = #{oid} AND p.del = false AND t.del = false ORDER BY p.id)
UNION
(SELECT p.id, p.name, p.descr, p.owner, uo.login AS ownerName, p.user_id, p.added, p.modified, p.del, p.done FROM ${schema}.product p INNER JOIN ${schema}.organization_product op ON op.product_id = p.id INNER JOIN ${schema}.users u ON u.id = p.user_id INNER JOIN ${schema}.users uo ON uo.id = p.owner WHERE u.id = #{uid} AND op.organization_id = #{oid} AND p.del = false ORDER BY p.id)
